TEXT.TITLE: SEAMAN FURNITURE <SEAM> IN STOCK SPLIT
TEXT.BODY: Seaman Furniture Co Inc said its board declared a two-for-one split of the company's outstanding stock. It said holders of its common will receive one additional share for each share held as of March 20. It said certificates representing additional shares will be distributed as soon as possible after April 10. Reuter
